pullRequest.title: Enable changing logger levels from properties when using Log4j
pullRequest.bodyText: When using the log4j2 feature, setting log levels via application properties does not work. It turns out it doesn't because there is no implementation of LoggingSystem for Log4j. This pull request fixes the problem.

commit.message: Enable changing logger levels from properties when using Log4j
Enable the loggers endpoint with the log4j2 feature
